Genetics may increase the risk of HSP, as it has occurred in different members of the same family, including in twins.",NIDDK,Henoch-Schnlein Purpura
What are the symptoms of Henoch-Schnlein Purpura ?,"The symptoms of HSP include the following:
                
- Rash. Leaking blood vessels in the skin cause a rash that looks like bruises or small red dots on the legs, arms, and buttocks. The
